Module it.polimi.ingsw.am43

Package it.polimi.ingsw.am43.Network.Messages.controllerMessages

package it.polimi.ingsw.am43.Network.Messages.controllerMessages
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.am43.Network.Messages
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.am43.Network.Messages.toClientMessages
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    SCMsgCardCouple
    The message sent from the client to the server when the player has chosen the card that it wants to place and on top of which card.
    SCMsgDrawPersonalObjectives
    This message is sent from the client to the server when the player has chosen the side of the starting card that it wants to place and has to ask the server for two ObjectiveCards.
    SCMsgFirstPlayerJoins
    This message is sent from the client to the server when the first player finishes setting up the game.
    SCMsgFirstStillJoining
    This message is sent from the client to the server when the first player of the game is still setting up the parameters, thus all the other players connected have to wait before doing anything.
    SCMsgGeneralPlayerJoins
    This message is sent from the client to the server when a player that is NOT the first, wants to join the game.
    SCMsgHeartbeat
    The message periodically sent from the client to the server once connected, in order to detect any disconnection from the server.
    SCMsgPersonalObjective
    This message is sent from the client to the server when the user has picked its own secret ObjectiveCard.
    SCMsgPlay
    This message is sent from the client to the server when it is the turn of the player sending the message.
    SCMsgPlayerRejoins
    This message is sent from the client to the server when a player wants to rejoin a game that has been loaded.
    SCMsgPlayTurn
    This message is sent from the client to the server when the turn has finished and all the information and modifications made by the player are sent to the server.
